Sentencas: La0.6Sr0.4MnO3 (LSM), which is considered a state-of-the-art solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) cathode, is investigated for application as an anode in direct methane intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Electrochemical study of symmetrical intermediate temperature - solid oxide fuel cells based on La0.6Sr0.4MnO3/Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 for operation in direct methane/air

Sentencas: Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 (CGO) is used as the electrolyte.
Titulo: Electrochemical study of symmetrical intermediate temperature - solid oxide fuel cells based on La0.6Sr0.4MnO3/Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 for operation in direct methane/air

Sentencas: The characterized electrode is a composite LSM/CGO, prepared in two different configurations:
Titulo: Electrochemical study of symmetrical intermediate temperature - solid oxide fuel cells based on La0.6Sr0.4MnO3/Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 for operation in direct methane/air

Sentencas: LSM crushed electrospun nanofibers / GDC powders, and LSM powders / GDC powders.
Titulo: Electrochemical study of symmetrical intermediate temperature - solid oxide fuel cells based on La0.6Sr0.4MnO3/Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 for operation in direct methane/air

Sentencas: The electrodes are tested in both air and direct methane conditions.
Titulo: Electrochemical study of symmetrical intermediate temperature - solid oxide fuel cells based on La0.6Sr0.4MnO3/Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 for operation in direct methane/air

Sentencas: At 815 ?, the polarization resistance R-p = 1.6 omega cm(2) in air, and R-p = 0.15 omega cm(2) in methane.
Titulo: Electrochemical study of symmetrical intermediate temperature - solid oxide fuel cells based on La0.6Sr0.4MnO3/Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 for operation in direct methane/air

Sentencas: Since perovskite-type manganites may show poor stability in reducing atmosphere, electrode stability is investigated.
Titulo: Electrochemical study of symmetrical intermediate temperature - solid oxide fuel cells based on La0.6Sr0.4MnO3/Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 for operation in direct methane/air

Sentencas: It is found that LSM shows a reversible modification of the crystal structure, assuming a Ruddlesden-Popper (RP) structure when exposed to methane.
Titulo: Electrochemical study of symmetrical intermediate temperature - solid oxide fuel cells based on La0.6Sr0.4MnO3/Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 for operation in direct methane/air

Sentencas: The RP structure is expected to be more stable compared to the LSM single perovskite.
Titulo: Electrochemical study of symmetrical intermediate temperature - solid oxide fuel cells based on La0.6Sr0.4MnO3/Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 for operation in direct methane/air

Sentencas: Furthermore, the composite electrode is expected to benefit from the presence of CGO, which is stable in reducing conditions.
Titulo: Electrochemical study of symmetrical intermediate temperature - solid oxide fuel cells based on La0.6Sr0.4MnO3/Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 for operation in direct methane/air
